3.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan and the Sunnah Regarding It

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Whoever calls the Adhan for seven years, seeking reward (from Allah), Allah will decree for him deliverance from the Fire

chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of The Adhan And The Reward Of The Mu'adh-dhin
